author: WorldwideHustle79
title: I actually really liked this hotel
text: I liked it from the minute I checked in...early after a transatlantic flight when Filippo checked me in and gave me a room and a cookie. Room was comfortable and spacious by European standards. Location great. Surrounding neighborhood perfect for food, pubs, markets, and theatre - much better than staying in the tourist district in west London. I'll stay here next time I travel to London.
